message: I just found out when leaving a group that there's actually an info page at /<group>/info/. This might be more appropriate to link to from groups found via the discover page (at least, a page like that is what I first expected).
@leah No problem :) Keep up the awesome work on the service, loving it so far!
It's linked in the "group actions" menu, but I too didn't find it until I left a group.
God no, I ate half a kilo of hamburger meat hours ago and I still feel sick.
